resources.string: This app was developed by Felix Tröbinger.\n\nThis app is not affiliated with University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria, Campus Hagenberg.
Invalid URL! Please check the URL in Settings and try again!
You can enable timetable integration in the Settings.

Go to LEVIS.fh-ooe.at -> Schedule -> Configuration -> iCal Settings.\nTick the "enable iCalendar sync checkbox and copy the link under "URL". It should look like this:\n"http://stundenplan.fh-ooe.at/ics/xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.ics"
This app uses the iCal Library biweekly by Michael Angstadt which is licenced under the BSD 2-Clause "Simplified" License.
